biotools.summary: Visualizes data from multiple array CGH or SNP array experiments in a genomic context. Its fast visualization engine and advanced web and database technology supports highly interactive use. It comes with a convenient data import mechanism, powerful search options for genomic elements (like gene names or karyobands), quick navigation and  zooming into interesting regions, and mechanisms to export the visualization into different high quality image formats.

bioschemas.name: FISH Oracle
